Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Candlelight \Can"dle*light`\, n. The light of a candle. [1913 Webster]
Never went by candlelight to bed. --Dryden. [1913 Webster]
candlelight n : the light provided by a burning candle [syn: {candle flame}]
